LanguageData.MaxHitPoints.label: максимальний запас міцності
LanguageData.MaxHitPoints.description: Максимальний запас міцності цього об'єкта. Це кількість шкоди, яке витримає об'єкт перед його знищенням.
LanguageData.Mass.label: маса
LanguageData.MarketValue.label: ринкова вартість
LanguageData.MarketValue.description: The market value of an object. The actual trade price will be adjusted by negotiation skill, relationship status, and other contextual factors.
LanguageData.SellPriceFactor.label: множник ціни продажу
LanguageData.SellPriceFactor.description: Множник на ціну, за якою ви можете продавати товари.
LanguageData.Flammability.label: горючість
LanguageData.Flammability.description: How easily an object catches fire and how quickly a fire will grow as it burns.
LanguageData.WorkToMake.label: залишилося праці
LanguageData.WorkToMake.description: The base amount of work it takes to make an item, once all materials are gathered.
LanguageData.DeteriorationRate.label: швидкість псування
LanguageData.DeteriorationRate.description: The rate at which this item deteriorates when left outside, in average hit points of damage per day. Deterioration rate is also affected by things like weather, roofs, toxic fallout, or being left in shallow water.
LanguageData.Beauty.label: краса
LanguageData.Beauty.description: How enjoyable an object is to look at. Beautiful objects fulfill characters' need for beauty.
LanguageData.Cleanliness.label: чистота
LanguageData.Cleanliness.description: How much an object contributes to an area's cleanliness score.
LanguageData.Comfort.label: комфорт
LanguageData.Comfort.description: How comfortable an object is to sit or lay on. Using comfortable objects fulfills a character's need for comfort.
LanguageData.Nutrition.label: nutrition
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChanceFixedHuman.label: food poison chance
LanguageData.FoodPoisonChanceFixedHuman.description: The chance this food will cause food poisoning.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyTurret.label: shooting accuracy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyTurret.description: Base chance to not miss per cell of shot distance. Chance to hit is also affected by many other factors. A hit chance explanation for any shot can be seen by selecting a shooter and mousing over a target.
